title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Simple, yet deeply flavorful.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cook guanciale until crispy; reserve rendered fat.
In a bowl, whisk egg yolks, cheese, and pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water. Toss hot pasta with guanciale and reserved fat.
Quickly mix in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to form a creamy sauce. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, & creamy tomato-based gravy. A British-Indian classic.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft. Add crushed tomatoes and spices.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then stir in heavy cream and cooked chicken. Serve with rice.
